creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: cup, rhinocerous horn, the handle formed of intricately carved animal and leaf forms which continue around the upper part of the body, partially obscuring a two inch band carved in cloud design; the base of the cup is decorated with a band carved in the hui motif; mhe opening of the cup is oblong and slightly flaring
inscription:
Inscription
[CHINA] - sticker from base now taped to card
title: Cup with Base
